You can use the online contact form below, where your message will be dealt with as appropriate, or alternatively contact us on the telephone numbers below. Honorary Secretary , Peter Mahoney: Tel: 01702 526 911 You may complete this form to send an email directly to Belfairs Golf Club. Alternatively, you can send an email to the following email address: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk . Contact Form Name Email Phone Subject **Please select an option** Clubhouse General Membership Members Website Account Request a Handicap Certificate Visitor Message Please do not provide anything sensitive here, like health details, or your credit card number. Verification We do not support SPAM and we would never sell your information to anyone. Any correspondence is strictly confidential. We will only use the above information to contact you about your query. Address Belfairs Golf Club Eastwood Road North Leigh-on-Sea Essex SS9 4LR Contact phone: 01702 526 911 email: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk Tee Times phone: 01702 525 345 Links RSS Feed Cookie and Privacy Contact Us Map/Directions Copyright © Belfairs Golf Club , 2011-2025. Contact Information Location Osoyoos Golf Club 12300 Golf Course Drive Osoyoos, British Columbia Canada V0H 1V4 Phone (250) 495-7003 1-800-481-6665 Office Hours Monday – Friday: 8 AM – 4 PM Saturday, Sunday & Stat Holidays: Closed Staff Directory General Manager Bryan Ewart, NGCOA BC Chapter President General Manager T: 250-495-7003 Ext. 213 Golf Operations Matthew Vincent, PGA of Canada Member Head Golf Professional T: 250-495-7003  Ext. 212 Administration Susan Henry Finance Manager T: 250-495-7003 Ext. 215 Emilio Martinez Membership & Office Administration Coordinator T: 250-495-7003 Ext. 214 Course Maintenance Ryan Dunkley Course Superintendent T: 250-495-2323 Food & Beverage Alana Egli Food & Beverages Manager T: 250-495-7003 Ext. 221 Herman Subaru Executive Chef T: 250-495-7003 Ext. 216 Contact Us Complete our inquiry form and we’ll be in touch. Join Our Team We’re always looking for friendly, dedicated individuals who want to be part of a welcoming environment and help create unforgettable experiences for our members and guests. Please see the current job postings below: Finance & Human Resources Manager Apply Now Perched above Lake Osoyoos and sculpted into the desert bench, Osoyoos Golf Club offers a one-of-a-kind golf experience in an unforgettable setting. Every round is a postcard in the making. Subscribe to our Newsletter © 2025 Osoyoos Golf Club. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy. Website designed by Par Six Golf Media Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Manage options Manage services Manage {vendor_count} vendors Read more about these purposes Accept Deny View preferences Save preferences View preferences {title} {title} {title} Manage consent Apply Now Temporary Online Booking Outage Please note that our online booking system will be unavailable from July 9 to July 11, 2025 as we transition to a new booking and point of sale system. To book/request a tee time during this period, please call the Pro Shop directly at 250-495-7003 or 1-800-481-6665 extension #1. Our team will be available daily from dawn to dusk to assist with your reservation. Thank you for your patience and understanding! Homepage - Bay Pointe Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Instagram Twitter Member Tee Times Guest Tee Times Call Us Today : (601) 829-1862 Book Tee Times Bay Pointe Country Club Welcome to Bay Pointe Country Club Home Tee Times Public Tee Times Member Tee Times Contact Directions E-Club LOYALTY REWARDED Employment GOLF CART WAIVER AND LIABILITY FORM About About Us Course Photos GPS Instruction Meet Our Staff Rates Scorecard Tips Videos Amenities Amenities The 19th Hole Grille Practice Facilities Pro Shop Trackman Indoor Simulator Mr. B’s Restaurant & Bar Learn Juniors Junior Golf 2025 FALL JUNIOR LEAGUE ⛳️ Little Gator’s Club SUMMER GOLF CAMPS SUMMER KIDS GOLF CLINICS U.S. Kids Gold Star Program Memberships Events Events Calendar Event Planning Event Hosting Corporate Outings Private Events Online Store Enjoy a round at one of MISSISSIPPI’S best golf courses! BOOK NOW e-club Welcome to BAY POINTE COUNTRY Club Bay Pointe Country Club features an 18-hole, par 72 course nestled among majestic timberlands and native wetlands along the Ross Barnett Reservoir. Water comes into play on many holes, increasing the challenge and scenic beauty. The golf course provides a test for golfers of all skill levels with its tight fairways, rolling hills and a shot-maker’s layout. It offers four sets of tees, measuring 6,713 yards from the tips. Bay Pointe is known for its year-round excellent conditioning and a special brand of southern hospitality. The golf course has hosted many junior, amateur, and professional events in his 35 year history. Bay Pointe Country Club offers many amenities that are available for both members and non-members. In addition to the 18-hole golf course, the club offers a fully stocked golf shop, a restaurant and bar, banquet room for events and meeting space, and four practice facilities (clubhouse putting green, short game practice area, a full swing practice range, and an Indoor Trackman Simulator. Tee Times Book your next round with us. Book Now INSTRUCTION Take your love of the game to the next level. Lesson Info STORE Shop clubs, apparel and more! Buy Today WE’RE EXACTLY WHAT YOU’RE LOOKING FOR The course amenities include 18 holes, putting green, driving range, short game practice area, indoor Trackman simulator, a full service restaurant and bar, meeting room, banquet facilities, swimming pool, and a fully stocked Pro Shop. Walking is permitted any time weekdays and after 2 p.m. on weekends and holidays. Bay Pointe Country Club is operated as a semi-private club with affordable memberships available and public play welcome. It is conveniently located on Highway 471 at the Barnett Reservoir in Rankin County, just minutes away from the Jackson-Evers International Airport. For directions, membership information and tee times call the Pro Shop at 601-724-1408 . Course Info NETWORKING AT ITS FINEST! Here at Bay Pointe Country Club, membership does has its privileges. Our members have unlimited access 18-holes of championship golf course nestled within Bay Pointe/Pine Ridge and sits alongside the Ross Barnett Reservoir. The club offers an array of amenities, including dining and bar, swimming pool, training facilities at the Brent Belton Golf Academy, Indoor Trackman Simulator, and a year round calendar of golf and social events. Memberships Full Family The Family Golf Membership extends all Membership privileges to immediate family to age 23.  The Membership includes full golf privileges, carts, pool, range balls, and access to all clubhouse amenities, as well as a full calendar of golf & social events. $190 Unlimited | $120 Walking Individual Member The Individual Golf Membership extends privileges to an individual Member.  The Membership includes full golf privileges, carts,  pool, range balls, and access to all clubhouse amenities, as well as a full calendar of golf & social events. $180 Unlimited | $110 Walking Junior (35 and Under) Member Our Junior Associate Membership extends full golfing privileges, carts,  pool, range, and access to all clubhouse amenities, as well as a full calendar of golf & social events to anyone under the age of 35. $150 Unlimited | $100 Walking Senior Member Senior Memberships extends full golfing privileges, carts, pool, range, and access to all clubhouse amenities, full calendar of golf and social events to anyone 60 years or older.  Bay Pointe R&GC offers a Senior Men’s league that is played Monday through Friday. $170 Unlimited | $100 Walking JUNIOR GOLF AT BAY POINTE “Bay Pointe offers one of the Top Junior Golf Programs in the State” – Tee to Green Magazine Sign Up! “Excellent course that gives golfers of every level plenty of challenges and rewards. Nicest staff on in Mississippi. Greens in pristine condition and lots to look forward to when playing this well maintained course. From great golf academy to good food this course has it all and more.” – Google Reviewer Upcoming Events There are no upcoming events. let us host your special day! Weddings Corporate Outings AN INCREDIBLE EXPERIENCE IS WAITING! Bay Point Golf Club in Panama City Beach | Visitors Map Home Visitors Maps View the Beach Map View The City Map The Blog Contact Us Rooms Hotels in Panama City Beach Hotels in Panama City Condos RV Parks Fun Stuff Theme Parks Activities & Attractions Golf Golf Cart & Bicycle Rentals State Parks Pontoon Boat Rentals Fishing Diving Wineries Restaurants Restaurants On The Beach Restaurants In Town Sweet Treats Shopping Nightlife Pier Park Pier Park Pier Park North St Andrews Downtown Bay Point Golf Club Bay Point Golf Club The only Nicklaus Design course in NW Florida, stretching 7100 yards, is sure to test every club in your bag. The signature island hole # 5 is just one of many that make this course stand out from the competition. A “must play” in PCB.  Bar 72 offers lunch daily, breakfast Saturday and Sunday, a local favorite.  2016, 2021,2022 US Open Local Qualifying Site. 5 pools, 3 restaurants, 4 full-bars, a Nicklaus Design Golf Course plus full-service pampering and so much more – this is enjoyment you can count on, any time of the year! Located minutes from the white sandy beaches of Panama City Beach, Wyndham Bay Point Resort has long been recognized as one of Florida’s most popular and respected full-service resorts offering a host of amenities including a premium golf experience on the 18-hole Nicklaus championship golf course. Boasting over 7,000 yards, the Nicklaus Course is the only Nicklaus Design golf course in Northwest Florida. This award-winning course features lush fairways with generous plateaus and uncharacteristic elevation changes unique to the Florida Panhandle region. A few holes offer stunning panoramic views of the Grand Lagoon and St. Andrews Bay.  You’ll find the golf course layout unique, challenging and definitely unforgettable. At the Bay Point Resort, opportunities abound with something for everyone…however, you define paradise!  Soak in the Florida sunshine at any of the five breathtaking pools, including the signature Reflections pool with two zero-entry points and plenty of cabanas and lounge chairs.  Or, melt all your cares away in one of three relaxing hot tubs.  You can practice your backhand on one of five clay tennis courts then hop on board our own private boat, Bay Point Lady, and take a ride to Shell Island, a 7-mile, uninhabited, secluded and pristine beach with sugar-white sand along the beautiful Gulf of Mexico.  For thrill seekers, Bay Point Water Sports rents jet skis or pontoon boats or let one of their experienced guides take you on a Dolphin Tour! When some well-deserved pampering is on your wish-list,  book an appointment at Bay Point Resort’s own full-service Serenity Spa. There you can get a Hot Stone Massage, Hydra-Quench Facial, manicure, and more. Here at the Bay Point Resort Panama City Beach, your total comfort is a top priority. Each one of our comfortable 316 smoke-free guestrooms and suites beckons with pillowtop mattresses and plush bedding – so you’re sure to get a perfect night’s sleep. Guests can select from either two double or one king size bed. Each bathroom features luxurious robes, marble vanities, and other complimentary bath amenities. At Bay Point Resort, guests can choose the accommodation that fits their style….Bay View Rooms, Lanai Rooms, One Bedroom Golf Villas, or Two Bedroom Golf Villas. Your vacation paradise awaits, at beautiful Wyndham Bay Point Resort Panama City Beach.  For tee-times, contact 850-235-6950 or visit baypointgolfclub.com. For reservations, lodging specials or golf package prices, call 1-850-236-6000 Bay Point Resort Golf Course Address: 4701 Bay Point Road Panama City Beach, Florida 32408 Phone Number: Local: 1.850.235.6950 Local: 1.850.230.172 Website: baypointgolfclub.com Social Links: Category: Golf Courses Recent Posts 810 Entertainment McGuire’s Irish Pub Rally By The Beach MilkShake Factory Outlaw Rentals ADVERTISEMENT Search The Map Search for: Beyond The Beaches Panama City Beach Panama City St Andrews Downtown PC Pier Park State Parks Tags 30a activity beachside beer Burgers cafe concert entertainment event exciting family family friendly featured food free fun gulffront gulfside harley kid friendly live entertainment local favorite Lynn Haven music nightlife Panama City Beach Pepsi Gulf Coast Jam performance pizza recipe restaurant scooter rental scooters secret shrimp St. Andrews sunset tasty Contact Us Submit an Event Got a Question? Let's Chat! × WE’RE SO HAPPY YOU’RE HERE. At the Bay Club, we strive to craft experiences that create a robust and active lifestyle for our members – with a focus on sports, fitness, hospitality, and family. A key piece of our success is listening to the needs of our members and using their input to influence our programming and amenities. And, we have found it is just as important to listen early – before the membership has even started. So, please tell us a little about what brought you here today and what you would like your Bay Club experience to look like. We thank you for taking the time to share a little bit about yourself and look forward to assisting you. What brought you here and why would you like to become a part of the Bay Club? Tell us about who the membership is for and how you envision it fitting into your life. What location are you interested in? About Us - Bay Pointe Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Instagram Twitter Member Tee Times Guest Tee Times Call Us Today : (601) 829-1862 Book Tee Times Bay Pointe Country Club Welcome to Bay Pointe Country Club Home Tee Times Public Tee Times Member Tee Times Contact Directions E-Club LOYALTY REWARDED Employment GOLF CART WAIVER AND LIABILITY FORM About About Us Course Photos GPS Instruction Meet Our Staff Rates Scorecard Tips Videos Amenities Amenities The 19th Hole Grille Practice Facilities Pro Shop Trackman Indoor Simulator Mr. B’s Restaurant & Bar Learn Juniors Junior Golf 2025 FALL JUNIOR LEAGUE ⛳️ Little Gator’s Club SUMMER GOLF CAMPS SUMMER KIDS GOLF CLINICS U.S. Kids Gold Star Program Memberships Events Events Calendar Event Planning Event Hosting Corporate Outings Private Events Online Store About Us Bay Pointe Country Club features an 18-hole, par 72 course nestled among majestic timberlands and native wetlands. Water comes into play on many holes, increasing the challenge and scenic beauty. The course provides a test for golfers of all skill levels with its tight fairways, rolling hills and a shot-maker’s layout. It offers four sets of tees, measuring 6,713 yards from the tips. Bay Pointe is known for its year-round excellent conditioning and the special brand of southern hospitality. The golf course has hosted professional, amateur, and junior state and local tournaments The course amenities include 18 holes, soft-spikes, putting green, driving range, short game practice area, Trackman Indoor Simulator, full service restaurant and bar, meeting room, banquet facilities, and a fully stocked Pro Shop. Walking is permitted any time weekdays and after 2 p.m. on weekends and holidays. Bay Pointe Country Club is operated as a semi-private club with affordable memberships available and public play welcome. It is conveniently located on Highway 471 at the Barnett Reservoir in Rankin County, just minutes away from the Jackson-Evers International Airport. For directions, membership information and tee times call the Pro Shop at (601) 724-1408. View our Course Tour Page Footer Contact Us Address : 800 Bay Pointe Drive, Brandon, MS 39047 Email : office@baypointecc.com Phone : (601) 724-1408 Bay Pointe Country Club | 800 Bay Pointe Drive, Brandon, MS 39047 | (601) 724-1408 Copyright © 2025 Bay Pointe Country Club All Rights Reserved. BAY POINT GOLF CLUB ACQUIRES NEW OWNERSHIP AND MANAGEMENT Â  - The Golf Wire Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Skip to footer Advertise â¢ Subscribe â¢ Contact The Golf Wire Covering the business of golf! MENU MENU Apparel Business Courses Equipment People Podcasts Jobs Search Close BAY POINT GOLF CLUB ACQUIRES NEW OWNERSHIP AND MANAGEMENT Â April 5, 2021 Twitter Facebook Pinterest Email BP Linx, LLC purchases Panama City Beach golf club and selects Bobby Jones Links as management companyÂ Atlanta, GA â BP Linx, LLC, a company owned by a local Bay Point family, recently acquired ownership of Bay Point Golf Club, the only Nicklaus Design course in Northwest Florida, as well as Bar 72, the restaurant on the property. The announcement comes alongside BP Linx, LLC’s decision to select Atlanta-based club management company Bobby Jones Links as the new management company, a decision that went into effect with the purchase of the property on Thursday, April 1. “I’m looking forward to helping Bay Point Golf Club maintain its stellar reputation in the community while building on the already strong base it has,” said John Warren, a representative of BP Linx, LLC. “With their employee-centric culture and strong focus on member and guest service, I really believe Bobby Jones Links is the perfect partner to be able to achieve that.” Bay Point Golf Club, located just minutes from the sandy shores of Panama City Beach, provides a full golf experience to guests of all skills and interests on its championship course, The Nicklaus Course. The semi-private golf club, which offers memberships but also welcomes public play, is nestled in a 1,100-acre nature preserve and carved from Northwest Floridaâs natural terrain of scrub oaks, pines and saltwater marshes. It includes five sets of tees stretching from 4,100 to 7,100 yards and boasts recently renovated greens as well as new green-side bunkers. Bay Point Golf Club, a continued favorite course in the area, has also won a Readerâs Choice âBest of the Bayâ award every year since 2016. âBay Point Golf Club is such a unique place to play, and we couldnât be more honored to have been chosen to help continue to raise it to new levels,â said Steve Willy, a Co-Founder of Bobby Jones Links. “We are excited to work with BP Linx, LLC to bring an array of resources, expertise and new ideas to the table.” Along with its purchase of the property, BP Linx, LLC also acquired ownership of Bar 72, the restaurant attached to the Bay Point Golf Club clubhouse, marking the first time in years that the restaurant and golf club will have the same owner and management. For more information on Bay Point Golf Club, please visit www.baypointgolfclub.com . Â Â About Bobby Jones Links Bobby Jones Links is an Atlanta-based club management company. Bobby Jones Linksâ partners and principles have broad experience building, owning, and operating more than 200 clubs worldwide. Bobby Jones Linksâ expertise goes beyond just golf and country clubs with work on additional projects and amenities such as lodging, spas, marinas, property owner associations, and real estate developments. VisitÂ www.bobbyjoneslinks.com Â to get to know how Bobby Jones Links makes a difference for their clients and associates.
